name: kexp-doubleplay-backend
description: KEXP Double Play Scanner Backend API

scripts.docker:build: npm run compile && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t geoffreychallen/kexp-doubleplay-backend:latest -t geoffreychallen/kexp-doubleplay-backend:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") .
scripts.docker:push: npm run compile && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t geoffreychallen/kexp-doubleplay-backend:latest -t geoffreychallen/kexp-doubleplay-backend:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --push .
scripts.docker:dev: npm run compile && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t geoffreychallen/kexp-doubleplay-backend:dev --push .
scripts.docker:run: npm run docker:build && docker run --rm -it --env-file .env -p 3000:3000 -v $(pwd)/data:/app/data -v $(pwd)/logs:/app/logs --name kexp-doubleplay-backend geoffreychallen/kexp-doubleplay-backend:latest
scripts.docker:run:dev: npm run compile && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 -t kexp-doubleplay-backend:dev . && docker run --rm -it --env-file .env -p 3000:3000 -v $(pwd)/data:/app/data -v $(pwd)/logs:/app/logs --name kexp-doubleplay-backend-dev kexp-doubleplay-backend:dev
scripts.docker:run:local: npm run compile && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 -t kexp-doubleplay-backend:local . && docker run --rm -it --env-file .env -p ${API_PORT:-3000}:${API_PORT:-3000} -v $(pwd)/data:/app/data -v $(pwd)/logs:/app/logs --name kexp-doubleplay-backend-local kexp-doubleplay-backend:local
